txt.en: Wanted: lost essences from the Vales of Anduin. Collect them to earn a reward suitable for collectors.
You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Someone has posted a task to collect lost essences. These can be turned in for a reward.
Deliver the lost essences to a collection box
You have accepted a task to acquire lost essences.
Wanted: lost essences from the Vales of Anduin.
